title: The best Chain Reaction deals | Latest offers on bikes, helmets, shoes, clothing and more
content:
We’ve scoured the latest Chain Reaction sale to bring you the best bargains going.

Chain Reaction’s Trail Hunter deals can offer up to 50 per cent off bikes, kit and components.

From reduced high-spec bikes to deals on finishing kit and component upgrades, there’s something for every rider.

We’ve chosen our top picks below, but if you’re looking for more, check out the full range from the Chain Reaction “Red Hot Drops” sale.

Bikes

Ridley Kanzo C Carbon Apex1 Disc Gravel Bike 2022

The 2022 Kanzo C gravel bike, with a carbon fibre frame, SRAM Apex1 drivetrain and a 11-42t cassette, aims to provide versatility for touring or bikepacking.

The frame is said to be inspired by mountain bike geometry, with angles designed for a balance between performance and comfort.

Ridley includes Shimano RS171 DB wheels and Vittoria Terreno Dry tyres, which are claimed to give you sufficient control for a range of riding conditions and terrain.

Read our full review of Ridley’s Kanzo Adventure.

Latest deals

Vitus Zenium road bike £1,199.99 £849.99

 

The Zenium road bike from Vitus features a full-carbon frameset, disc brakes, Shimano’s 10-speed Tiagra groupset and 28mm tan-wall tyres.

It was one of the contenders in our Budget Bike of the Year test in 2020.

Latest deals

Nukeproof Scout 275 Elite £2,499 £1,749.99

Chain Reaction Cycles

Released in May 2022, the Nukeproof Scout offers revised geometry and improved sizing options.

The geometry follows the trend for lower, slacker and longer numbers, which should make the Scout more capable on technical trails, while the new tube profiles are claimed to optimise ride characteristics.

This model has a 140mm-travel Fox Float Rhythm fork, Shimano SLX 1×12-speed groupset and 27.5in DT Swiss M1900 Spline wheels wrapped in Schwalbe Magic Mary and Hans Dampf tyres.

Latest deals

Vitus Mach 3 VRX Urban Bike £949.99 £664.99

Vitus’ Mach 3 hybrid city bike is said to shoot for a balance between function and comfort, aimed at commuters and those who prefer easy-going leisurely rides.

When tested, we were impressed by its handling, braking and weight, earning the bike four stars.

  • Read our full Vitus Mach 3 VRX Urban review.
Latest deals

Vitus Sommet 297 AMP Mountain Bike £4,599.99 £3,679.99

Chain Reaction Cycles

Featuring a mullet-wheel setup, 170mm travel front and rear and SRAM’s X01 Eagle groupset, this is another long-travel enduro machine with some really tasty build features.

The Sommet 297 is also kitted out with quality Maxxis Assegai and DHR II tyres and features a RockShox Reverb Stealth dropper seatpost.

Latest deals

Nukeproof Giga 290 Comp Carbon Bike £3699.99 £2,199.99

Nukeproof’s Giga, released in 2021, is the brand’s longest-travel trail bike. It’s available right now with a 35 per cent saving.

It features a RockShock Domain suspension fork and a Super Deluxe Select rear shock, designed for steep descents and technical climbs.

  • Read our first impressions of the Nukeproof Giga 290 Comp Carbon Bike
Latest deals

Helmets

dhb Aeron Helmet £85.00 £39.99

On the lookout for a new lid? Save 53 per cent when you buy dhb’s Aeron helmet in Chain Reaction’s sale.

It looks good, too, with its fuss-free aesthetic and comes in four colours.

Latest deals

Bell Super DH MIPS helmet £319.99 £212

Chain Reaction Cycles

This full-face, downhill-certified mountain bike helmet features a nifty tool-free removable chin bar.

The Bell Super DH, which scored a near-perfect four and a half stars on test, is also kitted out with MIPS and an easy-to-secure Fidlock buckle.

For those who love to capture the action, there’s also a neat breakaway camera mount.

Latest deals

Kask Protone Road Helmet £225.00 £112.50

We found the Kask Protone helmet offered great ventilation, comfort and fit on test, awarding it four-and-a-half stars in the process.

Weighing just 215g, the Kask Protone road helmet is a light piece of kit, and it’s a more affordable alternative to Kask’s Protone Icon.

Latest deals

POC Tectal Race SPIN Helmet £200 from £70

Chain Reaction

The POC Tectal Race SPIN is designed to offer lightweight protection for riders who like to shred with speed.

The lid features POC’s SPIN technology – the brand’s answer to MIPS – and is available in four colours.

Latest deals

Brand-X DH1 Full Face MTB Cycling Helmet £59.99 £24.00

Brand-X’s full-face helmet is designed for downhill riding, with a mean-looking matt black colour scheme.

It features 10 pocket air vents, designed to keep you cool without compromising on protection.

Latest deals

Clothing

Nukeproof Blackline Short Sleeve Jersey £50.00 £20.00

The Nukeproof Blackline short-sleeve jersey scored four-and-a-half stars on test. We thought it was well-priced when first released, so you’re getting even more value for money now.

We liked the cut and fit, and the stash pockets were great for small items.

Latest deals

Endura Hummvee II Shorts with Liner £64.99 £32

Chain Reaction Cycles

You’ll be spoilt for choice with the six colourways on offer through this deal on Endura Hummvee shorts.

Whatever your taste, the Hummvee II Shorts from Endura are a great deal with a chunky 51 per cent off.

Latest deals

dhb Aeron Bib Shorts 2.0 SS22 £80 £40

David Caudery / Immediate Media

Fancy saving 50 per cent off some new bib shorts? Look no further than the dhb Aeron Bib Shorts 2.0 from the 2022 spring/summer collection.

There are no fewer than seven colourways on offer at this great price, including classy khaki, navy and burgundy options.

Latest deals

Endura FS260-Pro Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey II £64.99 £26.00

The Endura FS260-Pro short-sleeve jersey is now available with a 54 per cent saving.

Made from a fast-wicking knit fabric and featuring four rear pockets for your gels and other essentials, this road jersey ticks plenty of boxes.

Latest deals

Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bib Tights £140 £61

Chain Reaction

We know how popular Castelli clothing can be with road riders, so the Easter sale is a good time to grab a bargain.

These Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bib Tights are available with a 56 per cent saving.

Latest deals

Cycling Shoes

dhb Aeron Carbon Road Shoe Dial £120.00 £59.99

The dhb Aeron Carbon Road Shoe Dial is one of the least expensive road shoes with a carbon sole on the market, and it performs well too, scoring four-and-a-half stars in our test.

With a stiff and efficient pedalling platform, this road shoe is a solid choice for sporty riders on a budget.

Latest deals

dhb Dorica MTB Shoe £85.00 £40.00

These cycling shoes feature a nylon sole, aiming to provide pedalling efficiency and comfort for long rides.

There’s an elastic lace retainer to keep everything tidy, plus perforated holes for a touch of added breathability in warmer weather.

Latest deals

Five Ten Freerider Pro MTB shoes £130 from £65

Mick Kirkman / Immediate Media

Rated an elusive five stars in our best mountain bike shoes round-up, Five Ten’s Freerider Pro mountain biking shoes are a real classic.

With savings of up to 50 per cent, what’s stopping you from upgrading to some new kicks?

Latest deals

Gaerne Volata Carbon Road Shoes £239.99 £108.00

Gaerne is renowned for producing quality cycling shoes, and you can now save 55 per cent on the brand’s Gaerne Volata Carbon design. Expect plenty of ventilation and an integrated heel-cup.

The Gaerne Volata Carbon Road Shoes are compatible with road bike pedal systems that use three-bolt cleats, including Shimano SPD-SL.

Latest deals

Accessories

LifeLine Performance Big Dial Track Pump £29.99 £17.99

The Big Dial Track Pump from LifeLine Performance has a maximum pressure of 160psi, with a steel base that’s designed to provide some added stability.

It features a large pressure gauge for easy reading, and is available right now with a saving of 40 per cent.

Latest deals

Garmin Edge 1030 Plus £519.99 £299.99

Jack Luke / Immediate Media

Wherever you’re riding, the Garmin Edge 1030 Plus will keep you on track.

This is a feature-rich GPS bike computer with full turn-by-turn navigation, as well as enough training and performance metrics to satisfy even the most data-hungry cyclist.

While the 1030 has been superseded by the Garmin Edge 1040, that means you can get it at a bargain price for what has been one of the best bike computers of the past couple of years.

Latest deals

Bolle Shifter £110.00 £76.99

These sunglasses feature a polycarbonate lens that delivers 100 per cent UV protection and an adjustable nose piece for a secure and tailored fit.

You can buy now with a 30 per cent saving.

Latest deals

LifeLine Digital Pressure Gauge £12.99 £9.99

Andy Lloyd

The LifeLine pressure gauge fits both Schrader and Presta valves securely, with no air leaks.

We gave it a four-and-a-half star rating in our pressure gauge group test.

Latest deals

Components

Maxxis Minion DHR II mountain bike tyre £61.99 £36.99

In our review of the Maxxis Minion DHR, we awarded it a score of four-and-a-half stars, and found it was suitable as a front tyre for steep trails.

It’s currently available with a saving of 40 per cent.

Latest deals

Nukeproof Horizon Pro Downhill flat pedals £99.99 from £44.99

Nukeproof has a solid reputation for producing high-quality flat mountain biking pedals at a reasonable price, and the Nukeproof Horizon Pro Downhill flat pedals are no exception.

Their generous size, exceptional grip and decent weight earned them four and a half stars in our in-depth review.

Latest deals

LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set £39.99 £32.99

Chain Reaction

The LifeLine Essential Torque Wrench Set provides you with total precision in your tool kit for a reasonable price.

It covers a 2-24Nm range and includes 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10mm hex heads, as well as T25 and T30 Torx heads.

Latest deals

Continental Grand Prix 5000 S TR road tyre £79.95 £69.95

The Continental Grand Prix 5000 S TR road tyre was a winner for us on test.

The tyre’s grippy, fast and lightweight performance resulted in a five-star review.

This may not be the biggest saving in Chain Reaction’s sale, but it’s a smart deal on a product likely to upgrade almost any road bike.

Latest deals

Shimano 105 R7000 11-speed rim brake groupset £599.99 £339.99

Simon Bromley / Immediate Media

Who said rim brakes are dead?

If you’re still running rim brakes, there’s good news – there are plenty of bargains out there, whether you’re upgrading your current bike or putting together a cut-price build project.

Shimano’s 105 R7000 11-speed groupset continues to offer slick-shifting, smart looks and braking that, dare we say it, still works just fine.

Latest deals

Brand-X Ascend II dropper seatpost £139.99 from £49.99

Andy McCandlish / Immediate Media

Quite simply, the Brand-X Ascend II is one of the best dropper posts you can buy – it offers excellent performance for a bargain price. 

The Ascend II proves reliability and quality performance needn’t come with a hefty price tag and, with three diameters, four lengths and four sizes to choose from, there’s a wide range of options for almost every bike.

It’s available from Chain Reaction at a remarkable 64 per cent off.

Latest deals
